overview: "How do I love thee? Let me count the toys!" That's exactly what Randy West and gorgeous Sabrina do on the eve of Randy's departure to Europe. Their Parting Shots are hot. Like Sabrina's dildo girlfriend. Or Randy's anal birthday treat. There's even a kinky remembrance of sleaze past. This couple has an open relationship ... that's for sure. But best of all is when the two of them get together for an evening of nonstop sex that's the wildest send off you'll ever see.
title: Parting Shots
